creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Inna Shulyak showing around her burned house in Fenevichy, Kyiv region of Ukraine. 12 people were sleeping inside when Russian missle put the place on fire. Luckly, everyone survived that day. The village suffered a short but devastating time under occupation when the Russian army was advancing towards Kyiv. Russians retreated from the Kyiv region in early April and left behind dead civilians and destruction.
